department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering
department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班

goal.en: Introducing construction diputes and their resolution methods. Case discussion will be conducted to enhence project management capabilities.
goal.ch: 介紹工程爭議之類別與解決之方法，並藉由實際案例之討論提升工程專案管理之能力

content.en:
1. Introduction to dispute resolution
2. Communication and negotiation skills
3. Model Contracts
4. Complaints
5. Mediation
6. Arbitration
7. Mediation for PPP projects
8. Delay analysis
content.ch:
1. 工程爭議處理簡介
2. 溝通與談判技巧
3. 國內契約範本
4. 公共工程－異議與申訴
5 公共工程－履約調解
6. 仲裁
7. 公共工程－促參案協調
8. 工期展延分析

grading.ch: 簡報表現（70％），期末考試（20％），期末報告（10％）

en.competency: Capability of independent research and innovative thinking
Capability of executing a project and leading the team work
Capability of serving the society with a vision of globalization and sustainability
Capability of presenting and publishing papers in international conferences

ch.competency: 具備營建管理專業能力
具備獨立研究及創新思考能力
具備專案執行及團隊合作領導能力
具備永續與國際觀及社會服務能力
具備國際論文發表之能力

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 口頭報告/口試

en: Department:Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering、Ph.D. Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCN5103 only.
ch: 系所:限土木工程學系營建管理碩士班、土木工程學系營建管理博士班。指定課程:必須先修CN5103。
